H0.text: Cape Verde was formerly a dependency of which European country. Portugal

H3.text: Cape Verde was formerly a dependency of which European country. Potiti

A4.text: According to Portuguese official records, the first discoveries were made by Genoa-born Ant√≥nio de Noli, who was afterwards appointed governor of Cape Verde by Portuguese King Afonso V.

A5.text: Portuguese explorers settled the islands, establishing one of the first European settlements in the tropics.
